title: Bug 116744 - Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text content type does not have any effect.
EB: The dynamic text content type should have an effect on the system.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
 1. Open the system and go to the settings menu. 
 2. Select the dynamic text content type. 
 3. Open any page or module that should be affected by the dynamic text content type. 
 4. Verify that the content remains the same and is not dynamically updated as expected.
